front.title: BGP-LS Extensions for SR Network Resource Partition SIDs

abstract.t: This document specifies extensions to the BGP Link-state address- family in order to advertise the information of Network Resource Partition SIDs. An external component (e.g., a controller) then can collect Network Resource Partition SIDs in the "northbound" direction. The draft is applicable to both SR-MPLS and SRv6 dataplanes.
